name: starter-template
description: This is a Wordpress blank starter theme that works with gulp. ## Installation ### Required * Install last stable version of [node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/). * Install [npm](http://blog.npmjs.org/post/85484771375/how-to-install-npm).   * open node.js command prompt (Run as administration) - it will open "c:\Windows\System32>"     and Run the command:        * on windows - `npm install npm -g`        * on Mac - `sudo npm install npm -g` * Install [Gulp](http://gulpjs.com/) globally in your system.  Assuming Node.js is installed, open the command line tool, and run the command: `npm install -g gulp`.
